subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: There might not appear to be two more different personalities coaching a game in the N.C.A.A. tournament than Wisconsin’s Bo Ryan and U.N.L.V.’s Lon Kruger.
snippet: There might not appear to be two more different personalities coaching a game in the N.C.A.A. tournament than Wisconsin’s Bo Ryan and U.N.L.V.’s Lon Kruger.
